workspace.title: PowerBI Workspace
workspace.description: Please leave this blank if user is trying to export into the signed-in account's workspace

datasets.title: PowerBI Datasets
datasets.description: Please enter the 'ID' of the dataset. *** Note: Not the 'Name' of the dataset ***

wait.title: Wait for refresh jobs to finish.
wait.description: Poll dataset refresh status and wait until it's finished. If set to No, the component execution ends as soon as the refresh jobs are triggered.

alldatasets.title: Wait for all datasets to finish
alldatasets.description: End job with error if any of datasets finish with failed status.

interval.title: Refresh job status polling interval (s)
interval.description: Check for status after specified amount of seconds.

timeout.title: Refresh job status polling timeout
timeout.description: Poll statuses of triggered jobs for specified amount of seconds. The component ends after the timeout value.
